summary: Sheep mod based on Goat skeleton
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t make this mesh file, rather it is a free resource by UMAR6419

The Model is from:
http://thefree3dmodels.com/stuff/animal/sheep/24-1-0-1150

You can subscribe to his youtube channel at www.youtube.com/umar6419
and visit his profile for such great rigs on thefree3dmodels.com

I only modified his model and textures for Skyrim.

I\'ve put 3 sheep inside the fence at the Honingbrew Meadery.
Type \"coc whiterun\" in your console and you\'ll be real close to it.

Feel free to use this mod however you want, but please send me a link. Thanks.

Some mods that use this mod:
SkyTEST - Realistic Animals and Predators by EtaYorius
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10175//?

Summon Farm Animals - Mounts and Followers by gg77
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31373
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=126262113

stormshallows sheep mod retextured by cansu
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37569//?
author: stormshallow
